title: Lego unveils new smart brick with embedded computer inside â€” Smart Play platform features tiny 4.1mm custom ASIC with sensors, RGB LEDs, and even a tiny speaker

title: 'One of the greatest disgraces in modern European football' - Smith and Sutton on Rosenior appointment

title: Battle of the Sexes 'brought eyes on tennis'
summary: Women's world number one Aryna Sabalenka defends the 'Battle of the Sexes' match against Nick Kyrgios after opening her season with a crushing win in Brisbane.

title: Realme 16 Pro+ in for review
summary: Realme kicks off 2026 in style with the 16 Pro+. The phone has a solid specs sheet, but what you'll notice first is just how impressive it looks. But before we get to either topic, let's unbox it. The phone ships with a full box - you get a USB-A to USB-C cable, a case, and an 80W SuperVOOC chargerâ€¦

title: Norrie wins and Kyrgios' return ends in defeat
summary: Nick Kyrgios' first ATP Tour match since March ends in a first-round defeat at the Brisbane International, as Britain's Cameron Norrie books his place in the second round with a hard-fought win.

title: Smith and Head score centuries as Australia punish England on day three
summary: Travis Head scores 163 and Steve Smith ends unbeaten on 129 as Australia close on 518-7 in their first innings, leading England by 134 runs at stumps on day three of the fifth and final Ashes Test in Sydney.

title: 'I hope he's here for a long time' â€“ Smith shows he's not done yet
summary: Steve Smith thwarts England again during the fifth Ashes Test in Sydney to leave only the great Sir Don Bradman ahead in terms of Ashes runs scored.

title: Here's when the vivo X200T is expected to launch and how much it will cost
summary: According to a new rumor, vivo will be launching the X200T in India in the last week of this month. The phone will have "aggressive pricing", starting around INR 50,000 to INR 55,000. That's lower than what a previous rumor claimed - INR 60,000. The vivo X200T will allegedly be offered in Stellar Bâ€¦

title: Smith and Head push England towards final Ashes loss
summary: Steve Smith's ruthless unbeaten century and Travis Headâ€™s majestic 163 on day three put Australia in total control of the fifth Ashes Test against England.

summary: Australia captain Steve Smith leads from the front as he scores his 13th career Ashes century on his home ground to help his team to 449-7 in their first innings, giving them a 65-run lead against England on day three of the fifth Test in Sydney.

title: Asia-Pacific Video Revenue to Reach $196 Billion by 2030, With India Overtaking China in SVOD Subscriptions, Report Forecasts
summary: Streaming services, social video platforms and connected TV are poised to dominate Asia-Pacific screen revenue growth through the end of the decade, even as traditional television continues its structural decline, according to Media Partners Asiaâ€™s newly released Asia-Pacific Video & Broadband 2026â€¦

title: Realme 16 Pro+ is here with 200MP main cam and 7,000 mAh battery
summary: Realme 16 Pro+ is the first major release from the brand in 2026, and it brings an updated design with a clear focus on cameras. It's among the first Realme devices to sport the new LumaColor Image image processing technology, which aims to deliver more natural skin tones, improved color accuracy aâ€¦

title: From Aronimink to Zalatoris - an A-Z of golf in 2026
summary: It could be a struggle to match the tumultuous highs of last year but there is still plenty to look forward to in the coming 12 months, writes Iain Carter.

title: Nvidia introduces DLSS 4.5 and Multi Frame Generation 6X at CES 2026 â€” updated models can generate higher-quality upscaled frames and more of them, dynamically
summary: Nvidia might not be introducing new gaming GPUs at CES 2026, but version 4.5 of its DLSS upscaler and an upcoming MFG 6x mode promises better image quality and smoother performance.

title: RedMagic 11 Air seemingly runs Geekbench confirming its chipset and RAM amount
summary: Last month RedMagic confirmed that it's working on the 11 Air, the successor to the RedMagic 10 Air launched back in April. The RedMagic 11 Air uses the Snapdragon 8 Elite SoC, as confirmed by a Geekbench run of a device with the model number NX799J. This is most likely the RedMagic 11 Air. The proâ€¦

summary: AMD reveals additional details about its strategy for AI and HPC deployments this year with EPYC 'Venice' and 'Venice-X' CPUs as well as Instinct MI430X, MI440X, and MI455X accelerators.

title: Qualcomm announces Snapdragon X2 Plus for cheaper laptops
summary: Back in September, Qualcomm unveiled the Snapdragon X2 Elite and Snapdragon X2 Elite Extreme chipsets for Windows on Arm laptops, and today it's introducing the cheaper option in the portfolio, the Snapdragon X2 Plus. This is the successor to the Snapdragon X Plus from September 2024. The Snapdragoâ€¦

title: Alienware brings OLED to its gaming laptops for the first time in years â€” anti-glare OLED display boasts 240Hz refresh rate and 0.2ms response time
summary: Alienware is bringing its 16-inch laptops up to speed with other high-end offerings, introducing a 240Hz OLED panel for the first time ever across its Area-51 and Aurora designs.

title: AMDâ€™s Ryzen 7 9850X3D promises 7% uplift over Ryzen 7 9800X3D â€“ AMD fights itself with â€˜new fastest gaming processorâ€™
summary: The long-rumored Ryzen 7 9850X3D is official, but AMDâ€™s own benchmarks paint an underwhelming picture for performance gains.

summary: AMDâ€™s new Ryzen AI 400 â€˜Gorgon Pointâ€™ APUs are primarily driven by a clock speed bump, featuring similar silicon as the previous generation otherwise.

title: Boundaries, drops and no more reviews - England's morning to forget
summary: Expensive overs, dropped catches and lost reviews sees England have a morning session to forget against Australia on day three of the fifth Ashes Test in Sydney.

title: Keychron launches wireless Q Ultra keyboard series with up to 660 hours of battery life with 8K polling â€” thanks to ZMK firmware
summary: Keychron launches new Q Ultra keyboard series with up to 660 hours of battery life with an 8K wireless polling rate, thanks to open source ZMK firmware. Also announces high-end luxury keyboards made of rock.

title: Head finally out for 163 as Bethell gets first Ashes wicket
summary: England finally bring an end to Travis Head's innings as he's trapped lbw for 163 by Jacob Bethell as he picks up his first Ashes wicket, to leave Australia 288-4 in their first innings, trailing England by 96 runs on day three of the fifth Ashes Test in Sydney.

title: 'He's way ahead of the rest' - Head hits another stunning Ashes innings
summary: Watch the best shots of Travis Head's first innings as the Australian batter hits 163 off 166 balls, his third score of 100 or higher in the series, to put his side in control of the fifth and final Ashes Test in Sydney.

title: Gemini on Google TV is getting smarter
summary: Today at CES, Google has announced a few improvements coming to Gemini for Google TV. These features will arrive on "select TCL devices" first, and other Google TV devices "over the coming months". First, you'll be able to use Gemini to search through your Google Photos library for specific people â€¦

title: 'What a miss!' - Jacks drops simple chance as Head survives
summary: Will Jacks drops a simple catch on the boundary as England miss the chance to remove Travis Head, who remains unbeaten on 121 on day three of the fifth Ashes Test in Sydney.

title: Amazon's Alexa+ now has a home on the web
summary: Amazon's AI-powered Alexa+ chatbot now has its very own home on the web at alexa.com. You just need to sign in with your Amazon account to use it, provided you are part of the Alexa+ Early Access. Amazon says over 10 million people are already using Alexa+, the AI-infused evolution of the Alexa assâ€¦

summary: There are also new gaming laptops.
